files.patch:
@@ -34,0 +34,3 @@
+      runs-on:
+        required: true
+        type: string
@@ -58,1 +61,1 @@
-    runs-on: macos-13
+    runs-on: ${{ inputs.runs-on }}

@@ -231,0 +231,1 @@
+      runs-on: 'macos-13'
@@ -242,0 +243,1 @@
+      runs-on: 'macos-14'
@@ -243,1 +245,0 @@
-      extra-conf-options: '--openjdk-target=aarch64-apple-darwin'
@@ -324,0 +325,10 @@
+  test-macos-aarch64:
+    name: macos-aarch64
+    needs:
+      - build-macos-aarch64
+    uses: ./.github/workflows/test.yml
+    with:
+      platform: macos-aarch64
+      bootjdk-platform: macos-aarch64
+      runs-on: macos-14
+
